text:
製造日期及批號：如產品包裝所示保存期限：3年
儲存方法：存放於陰涼乾爽處，避免陽光直接照射
或高溫。
注意事項：嚴重灼傷、損傷皮膚勿用；如發現肌膚出現任何不適，請停止使用並就醫診治；如不慎入眼，請用大量清水沖洗。
製造國：日本製造
製造廠名稱、地址及電話：Beauty-tech Japan
trans:
Manufacturing Date & Batch Number: Listed on the product packaging, Shelf Life: 3 years
Storage Instructions: Keep in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight
or high temperatures.
Important Notes: Do not use on areas with severe burns or other damage. If symptoms of skin irritation develop, discontinue use and check with your health care practitioner. If in eyes, wash out with plenty of water.
Country of Manufacture: Made in Japan
Manufacturer Details: Beauty-tech Japan, including name, address, and contact information
